xl.$description: The dynamic inline space tokens provide responsive spacing values for inline elements.

3xl.$description: The dynamic inline space tokens provide responsive spacing values for inline elements.

4xl.$description: The dynamic inline space tokens provide responsive spacing values for inline elements.

6xl.$description: The dynamic inline space tokens provide responsive spacing values for inline elements.

md.$description: The dynamic stack space tokens provide responsive spacing values for vertical aligned elements.

lg.$description: The dynamic stack space tokens provide responsive spacing values for vertical aligned elements.

xl.$description: The dynamic stack space tokens provide responsive spacing values for vertical aligned elements.

xl.$description: The dynamic inset space tokens provide responsive spacing values for homogeneous padding elements.

2xl.$description: The dynamic inset space tokens provide responsive spacing values for homogeneous padding elements.

4xl.$description: The dynamic inset space tokens provide responsive spacing values for homogeneous padding elements.

xl.$description: Minimim space applied only on the top and/or bottom of an element that dynamically varies from one breakpoint to another.

2xl.$description: Standard space applied only on the top and/or bottom of an element that dynamically varies from one breakpoint to another.

3xl.$description: Extra large space applied only on the top and/or bottom of an element that dynamically varies from one breakpoint to another.

4xl.$description: Twice extra large space applied only on the top and/or bottom of an element that dynamically varies from one breakpoint to another.

5xl.$description: Maximum space applied only on the top and/or bottom of an element that dynamically varies from one breakpoint to another.

afterHeader.$description: Spacing after the main page header.

withinPage.$description: Standard spacing between major page sections.

xl.$description: Small spacing within sections for tight groupings.

2xl.$description: Medium spacing within sections for standard groupings.

3xl.$description: Large spacing within sections for loose groupings.

4xl.$description: Extra large spacing within sections for maximum separation.
